data.name: Monthly Term Deposit 18 mth
data.description: Fixed term deposits offer a guaranteed rate of return on your money for the life of an investment. Choose the term or interest rate that best suits you.

features.additionalInfo: Monthly income term deposit redemptions prior to the expiry of the agreed term will be approved with 31 days' notice. During the notice period, no interest will be earned on the portion of the term deposit being withdrawn.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Customers must be aged 18+ to open a personal Term Deposit. Customers must be aged 18+ to open a non-personal Term Deposit. This term deposit cannot be opened through digital channels

eligibility.additionalValue: Be an Australian citizen, permanent resident or have a valid visa; or entity be registered in Australia

fees.name: Term Deposit early withdrawal admin fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged for withdrawal of funds from the term deposit prior to its maturity.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Interest rates expressed as annual percentage rates.
